Articles.Content:
Hello all made this account like yesterday, I have some questions about the forum.(well 1 question really)

I was trying to post my crafts on the spacecraft exchange but none of my posts showed up. can someone explain what I'm doing wrong or what is going wrong. would like some helpful guidelines for posting please thanks!

hopefully someone else who is having this problem will learn something useful too.
All the info you need, also, welcome to the community
Cool thanks, Didn't know where to post the quick question
Welcome to the forums, and the KSP world.
It's okay, plus you're off the automoderation queue now, so have fun on the forums and fly safe
